title: Manias, Panics, and AI
description: By any metric, the US – and, by implication, the world – are now in the midst of an intense AI speculative boom. To assess whether all the investment pouring into the industry will build something useful, three questions must be addressed.
content: By any metric, the US and, by implication, the world are now in the midst of an intense AI speculative boom. To assess whether all the investment pouring into the industry will build something useful… [+6353 chars]
